Class ScheduledTask

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.scheduling.config.ScheduledTask
public final class ScheduledTask extends Object
A representation of a scheduled task at runtime, used as a return value for scheduling methods.
Since:
4.3
Author:
Juergen Hoeller, Brian Clozel
See Also:
  • ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleCronTask(CronTask)
  • ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedRateTask(FixedRateTask)
  • ScheduledTaskRegistrar.scheduleFixedDelayTask(FixedDelayTask)
  • ScheduledFuture

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    cancel()
    Trigger cancellation of this scheduled task.
    void
    cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
    Trigger cancellation of this scheduled task.
    Task
    getTask()
    Return the underlying task (typically a CronTask, FixedRateTask or FixedDelayTask).
    @Nullable Instant
    nextExecution()
    Return the next scheduled execution of the task, or null if the task has been cancelled or no new execution is scheduled.
    String

  • Method Details

    • getTask

      public Task getTask()
      Return the underlying task (typically a CronTask, FixedRateTask or FixedDelayTask).
      Since:
      5.0.2

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Trigger cancellation of this scheduled task.

      This variant will force interruption of the task if still running.

      See Also:
      • cancel(boolean)

    • cancel

      public void cancel(boolean mayInterruptIfRunning)
      Trigger cancellation of this scheduled task.
      Parameters:
      mayInterruptIfRunning - whether to force interruption of the task if still running (specify false to allow the task to complete)
      Since:
      5.3.18
      See Also:
      • Future.cancel(boolean)

    • nextExecution

      public @Nullable Instant nextExecution()
      Return the next scheduled execution of the task, or null if the task has been cancelled or no new execution is scheduled.
      Since:
      6.2

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
